section.name: Modello XDOC Plugin
section.p: Modello XDOC Plugin generates model documentation using xdoc markup to be included in a Maven-generated reporting site.

subsection.name: xdoc
subsection.p: xdoc generator creates model-id.xdoc documentation containing an XML representation of the model, followed by a table with explanation for every model class.
An example is available to see the resulting document.
